entry.source: {F871,1}So... you have been mesmerized by the{F801}melody of these strings...{F801}{F802}But to join you would be quite an{F801}impossible request.{F801}{F802}Dance the dance of death to my tune{F801}until your life ebbs away...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}So... you have been mesmerized by the{F801}melody of these strings...{F801}{F802}But to join you would be quite an{F801}impossible request.{F801}{F802}Dance the dance of death to my tune{F801}until your life ebbs away...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Death is always at a Fiend's side...{F801}A mere gesture from me signals whether{F801}you will be its next prey.{F801}{F802}Answer my question and fight. That will{F801}determine whether you should live in{F801}darkness or feel Death's embrace...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Death is always at a Fiend's side...{F801}A mere gesture from me signals whether{F801}you will be its next prey.{F801}{F802}Answer my question and fight. That will{F801}determine whether you should live in{F801}darkness or feel Death's embrace...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}The encroaching battle with Death...{F801}You would attempt to thwart its designs?{F801}{F802}Very well... but you will pay a dear{F801}price for this.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}The encroaching battle with Death...{F801}You would attempt to thwart its designs?{F801}{F802}Very well... but you will pay a dear{F801}price for this.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}A promise is a promise... Go and{F801}continue living.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}A promise is a promise... Go and{F801}continue living.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}This... heaviness is... hard to resist...{F801}That... will not do...{F801}{F802}Perhaps... this battle should be...{F801}suspended... Allow me to sleep...{F801}for now...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}This... heaviness is... hard to resist...{F801}That... will not do...{F801}{F802}Perhaps... this battle should be...{F801}suspended... Allow me to sleep...{F801}for now...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...Wait. Allow me to heal you.{F801}{F802}If you are going to cling to life, then{F801}you should do so wholeheartedly...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...Wait. Allow me to heal you.{F801}{F802}If you are going to cling to life, then{F801}you should do so wholeheartedly...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Idle chatter... Is this how you would{F801}greet your death?{F801}{F802}Very well... but you will pay a dear{F801}price for this.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Idle chatter... Is this how you would{F801}greet your death?{F801}{F802}Very well... but you will pay a dear{F801}price for this.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Listen to the idle chatter of a Fiend...{F801}Whether it be life or death that awaits{F801}beyond...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Listen to the idle chatter of a Fiend...{F801}Whether it be life or death that awaits{F801}beyond...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ahhh...! Do you intend to quench this{F801}thirst with idle chatter?{F801}{F802}Then let us hold a conversation clouded{F801}by death...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ahhh...! Do you intend to quench this{F801}thirst with idle chatter?{F801}{F802}Then let us hold a conversation clouded{F801}by death...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall extend the duration of our{F801}conversation... How will you use the{F801}hours you have been given?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall extend the duration of our{F801}conversation... How will you use the{F801}hours you have been given?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Begging mercy from an incarnation of{F801}Death... How like man that is!{F801}{F802}Very well... Make an offering to{F801}the avatar of Death before you.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Begging mercy from an incarnation of{F801}Death... How like man that is!{F801}{F802}Very well... Make an offering to{F801}the avatar of Death before you.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}The offering pleases me... I shall be{F801}clement for the time being.{F801}{F802}But know that your shining life hangs{F801}preciously in the balance of death...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}The offering pleases me... I shall be{F801}clement for the time being.{F801}{F802}But know that your shining life hangs{F801}preciously in the balance of death...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}This heaviness... is hard to resist...{F801}Even Death... sleeps at times...{F801}{F802}Mercy... Yes, mercy... Now is not the{F801}time... of your death...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}This heaviness... is hard to resist...{F801}Even Death... sleeps at times...{F801}{F802}Mercy... Yes, mercy... Now is not the{F801}time... of your death...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I shall grant you further mercy...{F801}With that, let the conflict of life{F801}and death be felt all the greater.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I shall grant you further mercy...{F801}With that, let the conflict of life{F801}and death be felt all the greater.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Do you believe that you can squeeze{F801}money from a skull...?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Do you believe that you can squeeze{F801}money from a skull...?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}To show such avarice even at the moment{F801}of one's death... How dreadful is man's{F801}attachment to gold...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}To show such avarice even at the moment{F801}of one's death... How dreadful is man's{F801}attachment to gold...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Human whose soul is bound to gold...{F801}You have touched Death with trembling{F801}fingertips...{F801}{F802}Then I ask for your soul! Release it{F801}in death!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Human whose soul is bound to gold...{F801}You have touched Death with trembling{F801}fingertips...{F801}{F802}Then I ask for your soul! Release it{F801}in death!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You still continue this barbarism, even{F801}on the precipice of death...?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You still continue this barbarism, even{F801}on the precipice of death...?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}What folly... If it's money you wish,{F801}I can give you all your heart desires.{F801}{F802}Indulge in your false pleasures with{F801}your hollow money and transient life...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}What folly... If it's money you wish,{F801}I can give you all your heart desires.{F801}{F802}Indulge in your false pleasures with{F801}your hollow money and transient life...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}......!{F801}{F802}Your fingertips have brushed it...{F801}the core of the abyss of death...!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}......!{F801}{F802}Your fingertips have brushed it...{F801}the core of the abyss of death...!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Do you believe that you can wrest{F801}money from a Fiend? From Death?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Do you believe that you can wrest{F801}money from a Fiend? From Death?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Do treasures slumber in the depths of{F801}the abyss, or beyond it...?{F801}{F802}You will pay a dear price to find out.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Do treasures slumber in the depths of{F801}the abyss, or beyond it...?{F801}{F802}You will pay a dear price to find out.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Receive this treasure that was wrested{F801}from Death.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Receive this treasure that was wrested{F801}from Death.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Kakakakakaka...! Very well, very well!{F801}{F802}To think that a mortal would ask for{F801}treasure from Death's own hands!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Kakakakakaka...! Very well, very well!{F801}{F802}To think that a mortal would ask for{F801}treasure from Death's own hands!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Here is another treasure that Death{F801}holds hidden within...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Here is another treasure that Death{F801}holds hidden within...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Time's flow is fleeting... Let us{F801}decide this moment, with payment...{F801}{F802}{F804,1}{F878,1} Macca.{F804,0}{F801}Do you agree to this?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Time's flow is fleeting... Let us{F801}decide this moment, with payment...{F801}{F802}{F804,1}{F878,1} Macca.{F804,0}{F801}Do you agree to this?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Your {F804,1}stamina...{F804,0} I request{F801}{F804,1}enough to bring you to death's door.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Your {F804,1}stamina...{F804,0} I request{F801}{F804,1}enough to bring you to death's door.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Your {F804,1}spirit...{F804,0} I request{F801}{F804,1}enough to bring you to death's door.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Your {F804,1}spirit...{F804,0} I request{F801}{F804,1}enough to bring you to death's door.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Death... Your demon there...! I ask{F801}for the {F804,1}life of {F873,2}.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Death... Your demon there...! I ask{F801}for the {F804,1}life of {F873,2}.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}I ask for {F804,1}that thing.{F804,0} Yes...{F801}{F804,1}that{F804,0} will suffice for me...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}I ask for {F804,1}that thing.{F804,0} Yes...{F801}{F804,1}that{F804,0} will suffice for me...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}This thirst that cannot be expressed{F801}in words... What can quench it?{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}This thirst that cannot be expressed{F801}in words... What can quench it?{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}That brilliant life... Allow me to{F801}touch it briefly.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}That brilliant life... Allow me to{F801}touch it briefly.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ahhh... How exquisite... What a rare{F801}life force...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ahhh... How exquisite... What a rare{F801}life force...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ahhh... How exquisite... What a rare{F801}life force...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ahhh... How exquisite... What a rare{F801}life force...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Your offering pleases me. I consider{F801}myself satisfied now...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Your offering pleases me. I consider{F801}myself satisfied now...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Ah...! Such satisfaction as would leave{F801}even Death fulfilled!{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Ah...! Such satisfaction as would leave{F801}even Death fulfilled!{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Such folly, holding back on a Fiend...{F801}{F802}Death is fitting, since you seem to hold{F801}your life in such meager regard.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Such folly, holding back on a Fiend...{F801}{F802}Death is fitting, since you seem to hold{F801}your life in such meager regard.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}It ends here... Your luck in negotiating{F801}has expired.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}It ends here... Your luck in negotiating{F801}has expired.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Did you think you could cheat a Fiend,{F801}who sees all...?{F801}{F802}Death is fitting, since you seem to hold{F801}your life in such meager regard.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Did you think you could cheat a Fiend,{F801}who sees all...?{F801}{F802}Death is fitting, since you seem to hold{F801}your life in such meager regard.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You do not have it? What a pitiful life...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You do not have it? What a pitiful life...{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Even if one's thirst is quenched, going{F801}too far will cause rot and decay...{F801}{F802}Very well, now is a suitable time.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Even if one's thirst is quenched, going{F801}too far will cause rot and decay...{F801}{F802}Very well, now is a suitable time.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}Did you think you could cut short the{F801}endless thirst of a Fiend...?{F801}{F802}Death is fitting, since you seem to hold{F801}your life in such meager regard.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}Did you think you could cut short the{F801}endless thirst of a Fiend...?{F801}{F802}Death is fitting, since you seem to hold{F801}your life in such meager regard.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}To think that a mortal would deny{F801}a Fiend so vigorously...{F801}{F802}The strength of your life is magnificent.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}To think that a mortal would deny{F801}a Fiend so vigorously...{F801}{F802}The strength of your life is magnificent.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You continue to acquiesce and show{F801}obedience to me, a Fiend.{F801}{F802}You are nothing but one who walks{F801}constantly toward death... There is no{F801}worth in speaking to you any longer.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You continue to acquiesce and show{F801}obedience to me, a Fiend.{F801}{F802}You are nothing but one who walks{F801}constantly toward death... There is no{F801}worth in speaking to you any longer.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}To think that you would face a demon with{F801}nothing but your life...{F801}{F802}It is indeed a wonderful show of spirit.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}To think that you would face a demon with{F801}nothing but your life...{F801}{F802}It is indeed a wonderful show of spirit.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}You speak the same words as before...{F801}Your mind is a dying one that can no{F801}longer change.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}You speak the same words as before...{F801}Your mind is a dying one that can no{F801}longer change.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: {F871,1}...It seems you were drawn to my tune.{F801}{F802}Then let us go forth together again and{F801}dance the dance of death...{F801}{F802}
entry.target: {F871,1}...It seems you were drawn to my tune.{F801}{F802}Then let us go forth together again and{F801}dance the dance of death...{F801}{F802}
